content: little scallops hat **please note** this is an old and very basic pattern -more a set of directions than a true pattern- from the early days of knitting blogs i cannot give directions and help regarding this pattern but i don t want to take it down either since it became so popular so feel free to knit and adapt theese basic pattern instructions according to your own heart and take it for what it is an old freebie completely not test knitted or anything pattern includes instructions for a smaller version 0-6 months and bigger 3-4 years the scallops pattern is worked over a multiple of 8 stitches and can easily be modified to suit both adults and kids scroll to the bottom of the blog post for pattern in english good luck ps the hat is supposed to be slouchy -and the 0-6 months as well if you don´t want a slouchy hat for the really wee ones just make it shorter before starting the decrases
